### PR Checklist:
- [ ] Follow the style of the surrounding code
- [ ] Manual tests
- [ ] Write tests to cover all possible scenarios
- [ ] For bug-fixing PR, push a commit to snapshot failed scenarios triggered by CI prior to fix commit
